TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonGallery implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件显示 对象和 控件的菜单。

span.span: Represents a control that displays a menu of objects and controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像接口，显示的菜单对象和控件。Like the interface, displays a menu of objects and controls. 与不同接口，接口引发事件，而非事件，当用户单击。Unlike the Interface, the interface raises events, rather than events, when a user clicks a . 这意味着，例如，两次用户单击相同时引发事件两次。This means, for example, that the event is raised twice when a user clicks the same twice. (时上相同的方案没有进行初始选择将最多一次引发事件，取决于在第一次单击之前已的所选内容。)(The event would be raised at most once when the initial selection was made for the same scenario on a , depending on what the selection was before the first click.) 属性控制是否当前所选以可视方式的区别在于未选择的项。The property controls whether the currently selected is visually differentiated from the unselected items. 一次只有一项可以选择在。Only one item at a time can be selected in a . 属性可用于指定图像大小不是 16 x 16 和 32 x 32。The property can be used to specify image sizes other than 16x16 and 32x32. ### 若要在设计时添加 RibbonDropDownItem 对象To add RibbonDropDownItem objects at design time 1. 单击**项**属性中的**属性**窗口。Click the **Items** property in the **Properties** window. 2. 单击省略号 (**...**).Click the ellipsis (**...**). 3. 在中**下拉列表中集合编辑器**、 添加、 排序和编辑新项。In the **DropDown Collection Editor**, add, order, and edit new items. 您可以添加控件添加到在设计时。You can add controls to a at design time. ### 若要将 RibbonButton 控件添加设计时To add RibbonButton controls at design time 1. 单击**按钮**属性中的**属性**窗口。Click the **Buttons** property in the **Properties** window. 2. 单击省略号 (**...**).Click the ellipsis (**...**). 3. 在中**按钮集合编辑器**、 添加、 排序和编辑新的按钮控件。In the **Button Collection Editor**, add, order, and edit new button controls. 您可以创建在运行时通过使用方法的对象。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. 可以设置此控件的某些属性，只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，或者该控件添加到动态菜单之前。Some properties of this control can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application or before the control is added to a dynamic menu at run time. 有关如何设置这些属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 用户单击此 上的按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user clicks a button on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在单击任何按钮，将引发此事件。This event is raised if any button is clicked on the . 您可以确定通过检查被单击的按钮`sender`事件处理程序的参数。You can determine which button was clicked by examining the `sender` parameter of the event handler.

summary.span: 获取此 上的按钮的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of buttons on this .

value.span: 此 上的按钮集合。

span.span: The collection of buttons on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将按钮添加到此在运行时。You can add buttons to this at run time. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: 用户单击此 上的项时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user clicks an item on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次用户单击时，将引发此事件对此。This event is raised every time a user clicks a on this . 如果属性设置为`true`，仅当用户单击当前未选的项时引发此事件。If the property is set to `true`, this event is raised only when a user clicks an item that is not currently selected.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 中的“项”列的数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of Item columns in this .

value.span: 数项在此列。

span.span: The number of Item columns in this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the control.

value.span: 一个Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize表示大小的控件。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不起如果是菜单的一部分。This property has no effect if the is part of a menu. 的上出现一个菜单始终设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`除非父控件`ItemSize`设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。The of a that appears on a menu is always set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular` unless the parent control's `ItemSize` is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 若要使下拉列表菜单控件显示得更大，设置的属性到`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。To make drop-down menu controls appear larger, set the property of the to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 可以在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单或拆分按钮中此 控件上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this control on a menu or split button.

value.span: 一个 ，表示菜单或拆分按钮上的文本。

span.span: A that represents the text on a menu or split button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此控件嵌套在另一个菜单或拆分按钮，显示的说明和菜单中，属性或拆分按钮的属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。The description appears when this control is nested in another menu or split button, and the property of the menu, or the property of the split button, is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置在按钮上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the button.

value.span: 一个在按钮上显示的 。

span.span: An that is displayed on the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，该控件的外观被更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置属性，则和属性将被忽略。If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性可让您更好地控制比其他两个属性，这一点可以是速度较慢，因为每次更新控件时，图像对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识 。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use to identify the in the event handler.

value.span: 一个字符串，可用于在 事件处理程序中标识 。

span.span: A string that you can use in the event handler to identify the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序此映像从你的解决方案只检索一次，以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 此属性可以设置只能在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载过程事件。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 时将引发一次每个映像名称显示在功能区。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后，不能使用此属性更改控件图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载图像，将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性并设置属性的到想要加载的图像的对象。Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果忽略此属性属性或属性设置。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以稍快于标识的图像加载显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序中检索映像解决方案仅在首次从功能区。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，用于提供此 中的项所显示的图像的尺寸。

span.span: Gets or sets a that gives the dimensions of the images that are displayed by the items in this .

value.span: 一个 ，可提供此 中的项所显示的图像尺寸。

span.span: A that gives the dimensions of the images that are displayed by the items in this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供了更好地控制映像大小以外或。The interface gives more control over the image size than either or . 它是唯一的三个接口，可用于以像素为单位指定图像的宽度和高度。It is the only one of the three interfaces that enables you to specify an image width and height in pixels. 此属性不会影响在此按钮上显示图像的大小。This property does not affect the size of images displayed on buttons in this .

summary.span: 获取一个此 中 组件的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the components in this .

value.span: 一个此 中的 组件集合。

span.span: A collection of the components in this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以添加对象添加到在设计时或在运行时。You can add objects to a at design time or at run time.

summary.span: 打开 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发生此事件每次打开时，即使没有任何项或在其中的按钮。This event occurs every time the is opened, even when there are no items or buttons in it.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for this .

value.span: 此 的当前键盘快捷键。

span.span: The current keyboard shortcut for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Keytip 必须包含 1 到 3 个大写字符，不能包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时也称为访问密钥或加速器和用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，你的快捷键提示与键提示冲突，Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配非冲突快捷键提示值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: 获取或设置此 上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this .

value.span: 此 上显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears on this .

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在控件上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the control, if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识的控件显示 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，该控件的外观被更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关一系列`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页[Office 2010 外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果忽略此属性属性设置。This property is ignored if the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以稍快于标识的图像加载属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配给在库控件中的两个项。The following example assigns Microsoft Office icons to two items in a gallery control. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 项目模板创建的项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office project templates in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将库添加到组。Add a gallery to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置库的位置（如果库在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the gallery, if the gallery is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 一个 ，表示库的位置（如果库在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: A that represents the position of the gallery, if the gallery is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 属性时库放置在功能区组中没有任何作用。The property has no effect when the gallery is placed in a group on the Ribbon.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 显示的 组件的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows of components that this displays.

value.span: 此 显示的 组件的行数。

span.span: The number of rows of components that this displays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这它包含更多的滚动超过了可显示的组件。This scrolls if it has more components than can be displayed. 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到此 上方时显示的提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over this .

value.span: 用户将指针移到控件上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 当设置属性，则值将显示的标题为。When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置当前所选的项目。

span.span: Gets or sets the currently selected item.

value.span: 当前选定的 。

span.span: The currently selected .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前选定的项只是以可视方式区分开来的项的其余部分如果属性设置为`true`。The currently selected item is only visually distinguishable from the rest of the items if the property is set to `true`. 如果此至少有一个在其集合，然后不保证是`null`。If this has at least one in its collection, then is guaranteed not to be `null`. 默认情况下，第一个在选择集合。By default, the first in the collection is selected. 此属性只能设置为组件中这控件的集合。This property can only be set to components that are in this control's collection.

summary.span: 获取或设置当前选定的 的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the currently selected .

value.span: 当前选定的 的索引。

span.span: The index of the currently selected .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改属性返回的值更改属性。Changing the property changes the value returned by the property. 实际上，更改属性发生更改所选内容。In effect, changing the property changes the selection. 分配给值必须为从 0 （零） 通过 (`Items.Count` -1)。Values assigned to the must be from 0 (zero) through (`Items.Count` - 1). 如果集合为空，则此属性返回-1。If the collection is empty, this property returns -1.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与 关联的图像是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the is visible.

value.span: 如果与控件关联的图像可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image that is associated with the control is visible; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性自动设置为`true`如果您设置， ，或在设计时属性。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property at design time. 可以将其设置为`false`以与要隐藏此控件关联的图像。You can set it to `false` to cause the image associated with this control to be hidden. 设置， ，或在运行时属性的值不更改属性。Setting the , , or property at run time does not change the value of the property. 此属性不起作用的实例，此按钮上快速访问工具栏显示。This property has no effect for instances of this button that are displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar. 如果此属性设置为`true`，但没有与控件关联的图像，显示一个空白图像。If this property is set to `true`, but there is no image associated with the control, a blank image is displayed.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为库中的项显示图像。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether images are displayed for the items in the gallery.

value.span: 如果显示图像，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the images are displayed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为此 中的项显示标签。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether labels are shown for items on this .

value.span: 如果标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the labels are visible; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前所选的 在外观上是否与其余未选择的项有所区别。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the currently selected is visually differentiated from the rest of the unselected items.

value.span: 如果所选项突出显示，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if selected items are highlighted, otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设置为`false`不会导致当前所选内容已经被删除。Setting the property to `false` does not cause the current selection to go away. 当前所选内容只是不是用户界面中直观地标识。The current selection is just not visually identified in the user interface. 保证不会`null`如果此至少有一个中其集合。The is guaranteed not to be `null` if this has at least one in its collection. 默认情况下，第一个在选择集合。By default, the first in the collection is selected. 如果属性设置为`true`，则事件的仅当用户单击当前未选的项时引发。If the property is set to `true`, the event of the is raised only when a user clicks an item that is not currently selected. 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for this is visible.

value.span: 如果标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label is visible, otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 下显示文本。The appears under text. 与不同，则启用换行符的字符串中。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.
